result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Scheduling conference on November 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Scheduling conference on October 31, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

OFF RECORD/ 11:04 AM   Defendant Marlon NMI Brabbs appeared by video, from the Sawyer County Jail. Attorney Michelle M Erdman appeared by video for Nicholas E Baker.  Attorney Jennifer Gross in court for State of Wisconsin. Court Discussion speaks on court record and proceedings. Atty Erdman to contact the JA for scheduling.
Review scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 08:00 am.
Status conference on October 18, 2022 at 11:00 am.

OFF RECORD - 11:13 AM Defendant Marlon NMI Brabbs appeared by video from the Sawyer County Jail.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman appeared by video for Marlon NMI Brabbs.  Attorney Jennifer Gross in court for State of Wisconsin. Court discusses with Def Atty on status. Def Atty speaks on representative. State asks question if this Def Atty is covering his other cases. Court makes statement to Def Atty to have her contact the Judicial Assistant by noon on Friday 08/19/2022 for Motion Hearing on Return on Property.

11:47 AM Defendant Marlon NMI Brabbs appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman appeared by video for Marlon NMI Brabbs.  Attorney Jennifer Gross in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances.   Attny Erdman makes argument for bond modification.   State makes objection for bond modification, request bond remain.  Attny Erdman continues argument.    Court denies bond motion.

Attny Erdman makes motion to return seized money.   State indicates this case has no seized money, Cash seized from June 2, 2022   Court indicates motion does not apply to this case, and takes no action on motion.
Motion hearing on June 17, 2022 at 11:45 am.

1:38 PM Defendant Marlon NMI Brabbs appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Jennifer Gross in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman appeared by video for Marlon NMI Brabbs. Court calls case and recites appearances.  Attny Erdman acknowledges information, waives reading.  DEF enters NG plea on Count 1-3.  Court finds probable cause and binds DEF over for trial.
Status conference scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on August 9, 2022 at 11:00 am.

3:52 PM Defendant Marlon NMI Brabbs appeared by video, in custody from Sawyer County Jail, with Attorney Michelle M Erdman appearing by video.  Attorney Jennifer Gross in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances. Atty Erdman indicates DEF would like to proceed with Preliminary hearing.  3:53PM State calls witness, LCO Investigator Chris Leverton.  Court swears in witness.  State questions witness.  3:59PM Witness identifies DEF.  State continues questioning witness.  4:05PM 
 State tenders witness.  Atty Erdman cross examines witness. 4:06 Atty Erdman concludes questioning.  Witness excused.  No additional witnessess.  State requests bind over.  Atty Erdman makes no statement.  Court finds Probable Cause and binds DEF over for trial.  Court sets  ARGN 6/14/22 at 1:30PM
Arraignment scheduled for June 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
